verses.verse: There was also a lot <S%H1486><s%> for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>; for he was the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%>; to wit, for Machir <S%H4353><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, the father <S%H1><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>: because he was a man <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>, therefore he had Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%> and Bashan <S%H1316><s%>.

There was also a lot for the rest <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8737><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> by their families <S%H4940><s%>; for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Abiezer <S%H44><s%>, and for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Helek <S%H2507><s%>, and for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asriel <S%H844><s%>, and for the children <S%H1121><s%> of SH'khem <S%H7928><s%>, and for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Hepher <S%H2660><s%>, and for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Shemida <S%H8061><s%>: these were the male <S%H2145><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%> by their families <S%H4940><s%>.

But TZ'lof'chad <S%H6765><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hepher <S%H2660><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, had no sons <S%H1121><s%>, but daughters <S%H1323><s%>: and these are the names <S%H8034><s%> of his daughters <S%H1323><s%>, Mahlah <S%H4244><s%>, and Noach <S%H5270><s%>, Hoglah <S%H2295><s%>, Milcah <S%H4435><s%>, and Tirzah <S%H8656><s%>.

And they came near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, and before <S%H6440><s%> Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, and before <S%H6440><s%> the princes <S%H5387><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, The YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> us an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> our brethren <S%H251><s%>. Therefore according to the Mitzvah <S%H6310><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the brethren <S%H251><s%> of their father <S%H1><s%>.

And there fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> portions <S%H2256><s%> to M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, beside the land <S%H776><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%> and Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, which were on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%>;

Because the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> had <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8804><s%> an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%>: and the rest <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8737><s%> of M'nasheh's <S%H4519><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> had the land <S%H776><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>.

And the coast <S%H1366><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> was from Asher <S%H836><s%> to Michmethah <S%H4366><s%>, that lieth before <S%H6440><s%> SH'khem <S%H7927><s%>; and the border <S%H1366><s%> went along <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> on the right hand <S%H3225><s%> unto the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Entappuah <S%H5887><s%>.

Now M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> had the land <S%H776><s%> of Tappuah <S%H8599><s%>: but Tappuah <S%H8599><s%> on the border <S%H1366><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> belonged to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%>;

And the coast <S%H1366><s%> descended <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the river <S%H5158><s%> Kanah <S%H7071><s%>, southward <S%H5045><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%>: these cities <S%H5892><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%> are among <S%H8432><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>: the coast <S%H1366><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> also was on the north side <S%H6828><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%>, and the outgoings <S%H8444><s%> of it were at the sea <S%H3220><s%>:

Southward <S%H5045><s%> it was Efrayim's <S%H669><s%>, and northward <S%H6828><s%> it was M'nasheh's <S%H4519><s%>, and the sea <S%H3220><s%> is his border <S%H1366><s%>; and they met together <S%H6293><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in Asher <S%H836><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%>, and in Yissakhar <S%H3485><s%> on the east <S%H4217><s%>.

And M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> had in Yissakhar <S%H3485><s%> and in Asher <S%H836><s%> Bethshean <S%H1052><s%> and her towns <S%H1323><s%>, and Ibleam <S%H2991><s%> and her towns <S%H1323><s%>, and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%> and her towns <S%H1323><s%>, and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Endor <S%H5874><s%> and her towns <S%H1323><s%>, and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Taanach <S%H8590><s%> and her towns <S%H1323><s%>, and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Megiddo <S%H4023><s%> and her towns <S%H1323><s%>, even three <S%H7969><s%> countries <S%H5316><s%>.

Yet the children <S%H1121><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not drive out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the inhabitants of those cities <S%H5892><s%>; but the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%> would <S%H2974><s%> <S%H8686><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in that land <S%H776><s%>.

Yet it came to pass, when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> were waxen strong <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, that they put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%> to tribute <S%H4522><s%>; but did not utterly <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8687><s%> drive them out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Why hast thou given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me but one <S%H259><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> portion <S%H2256><s%> to inherit <S%H5159><s%>, seeing I am a great <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, forasmuch as <S%H5704><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me hitherto <S%H3541><s%> ?

And Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, If thou be a great <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, then get thee up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to the wood <S%H3293><s%> country, and cut down <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for thyself there in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%> and of the giants <S%H7497><s%>, if mount <S%H2022><s%> Efrayim <S%H669><s%> be too narrow <S%H213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for thee.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, The hill <S%H2022><s%> is not enough <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8735><s%> for us: and all the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the valley <S%H6010><s%> have chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>, both they who are of Bethshean <S%H1052><s%> and her towns <S%H1323><s%>, and they who are of the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Yizre`el <S%H3157><s%>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%>, even to Efrayim <S%H669><s%> and to M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Thou art a great <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, and hast great <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3581><s%>: thou shalt not have one <S%H259><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> only:

But the mountain <S%H2022><s%> shall be thine; for it is a wood <S%H3293><s%>, and thou shalt cut it down <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8765><s%>: and the outgoings <S%H8444><s%> of it shall be thine: for thou shalt drive out <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%>, though they have iron <S%H1270><s%> chariots <S%H7393><s%>, and though they be strong <S%H2389><s%>.
